players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Bob was killed last night, and I'm just a villager trying to make sense of this. Charlie, Diana, any ideas on who might be suspicious?"
Diana: "Charlie is the mafioso. I investigated him last night and confirmed his role."
Charlie: "Diana is lying about investigating me. She's trying to frame me without any real evidence. As a villager, I'm suspicious of anyone making such bold accusations on Day 1."
You: "Charlie, if you're truly a villager, can you suggest any other suspects or reasons why Diana might be lying? We need more information to decide."
Diana: "Charlie, your silence speaks volumes. Alice, I'm the detective, and I confirmed Charlie as the mafioso. We need to vote wisely to win."
